meanings.definition: A new or unfamiliar thing or person.
meanings.sent1: I saw a strange nu in the park today.
meanings.sent2: The students were curious about the nu in their class.
meanings.sent3: The nu at the party was a talking parrot!
meanings.sent4: Her arrival was like a nu, bringing excitement to the room.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious nu in the forest captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A unit of energy equal to one billionth of a joule.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the energy in nus.
meanings.sent2: One nu of energy can power a tiny light bulb.
meanings.sent3: The tiny nu jumped around the lab, full of energy.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was like a burst of nus, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The nu of energy hummed softly, filling the room with warmth.

meanings.definition: A Greek letter (Ν, ν) used in mathematics and science.
meanings.sent1: The math problem involved the use of the nu symbol.
meanings.sent2: In science class, we learned about the significance of nu.
meanings.sent3: The nu symbol on the board seemed to wink at me mischievously.
meanings.sent4: The concept of infinity was represented by the nu, stretching beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: The nu symbol danced across the page, adding a touch of elegance to the equation.
